body:
This is a Introduce Myself and AMA so here we go,
I came across Avicus when a very good friend of mine (ParaSpider) told me about this server which I then played on for a short period. I found myself to stick to this server like glue after playing on it  and even made me leave the old server I enjoyed playing on to come play here. 

That was just a small introduction now it is the AMA, start asking!

title: It's called AMA right?

replies.body: How did you hear about the server?
replies.body_tagged: How did you hear about the server?

replies.body: It says in the opening paragraph but, ParaSpider a very good friend to me told me about it.
replies.body_tagged: It says in the opening paragraph but, ParaSpider a very good friend to me told me about it.

replies.body:
Ooops I read over that part.
Last question, Carrots or Potatoes?
replies.body_tagged:

reply_to.body: It says in the opening paragraph but, ParaSpider a very good friend to me told me about it.

replies.body: That's a hard one, I think I have to go with Potatoes, you?
replies.body_tagged: That's a hard one, I think I have to go with Potatoes, you?

replies.body: Yeah, I would also chose out of the orange soda category Fanta. However I like stuff like Red Bull more :)

replies.body:
Are you wearing a cookie monster hoodie?
Do you prefer Mac or Windows?
How often do you pick your nose?
In a critical situation where you are surrounded by evil teddy bears, would you rather eat crayons or ride a flying glue stick?
replies.body_tagged:
Are you wearing a cookie monster hoodie?
Do you prefer Mac or Windows?
How often do you pick your nose?
In a critical situation where you are surrounded by evil teddy bears, would you rather eat crayons or ride a flying glue stick?

replies.body:
(1) Yes I am
(2) Windows
(3) Never
(4) Ride a flying glue stick would be the most sane answer.
